completion_notes: Implemented complete error handling system for Obsidian plugin including: (1) Error classification system with PluginError base class and 7 error subclasses (NetworkError, CanvasParseError, APIError, ValidationError, ConfigurationError, TimeoutError, AgentExecutionError); (2) GlobalErrorHandler singleton with error deduplication, global exception catching, and structured logging; (3) ErrorNotifier for user-friendly notifications using Obsidian Notice API; (4) RetryPolicy with exponential backoff and CircuitBreaker pattern; (5) ErrorLogger with persistence, rotation, and markdown/JSON export; (6) ErrorRecoveryManager with cache fallback, state rollback, and degraded mode; (7) RecoveryModal and ErrorLogModal UI components; (8) Comprehensive test suite with 58 tests covering all error scenarios. Note: Plugin base structure (Story 13.1) was created as prerequisite since it was pending.
